tutorialText:
Achieve target in the given moves 
 by matching 3 or more pets together
Use Magic Candy to collect a single pet

Use Goody Bag 
 to collect similar colored pets
Tap here to increase your moves

unlockedBadgeData.heading: ACHIEVEMENTS
unlockBadgeText:
To unlock this 
 Achieve the target within 5 moves

To unlock this 
 Achieve the target with 13 moves 
 left

To unlock this 
 Score 8500 points with 8 moves 
 left

To unlock this 
 Score 7200 points with 3 moves 
 left

To unlock this 
 Score 9200 points with 5 moves 
 left
unlockedBadgeMessage:
You have successfully completed 
 a level with 5 moves.

You have successfully completed 
 a level with 13 moves left.

You have successfully scored 
 5000 points in one level.

You have successfully scored 
 4000 points with 8 moves left.

You have successfully scored 
 3000 points with 3 moves left.

You have successfully scored 
 9200 points with 5 moves left.

unlockMsg.heading: Congratulations!
unlockMsg.message:
You have unlocked new animal 
 for playing

shop.successMessage:
Your purchase was successful 
 you received this item
shop.failMessage:
Keep on playing to unlock stars 
 and receive more coins

noAttempts.heading: No Attempts Left!
noAttempts.suggestionMsg: You can buy a new set of lives now
